5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever persists in performing twelve Rak’ah from the Sunnah, a house will be built for him in Paradise: four before the Zuhr, two Rak’ah after Zuhr, two Rak’ah after Maghrib, two Rak’ah after the ‘Isha’ and two Rak’ah before Fajr.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ثِنْتَىْ عَشْرَةَ رَكْعَةً مِنَ السُّنَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning twelve Rak’ah from the Sunnah
